showPreviousViewOnLoad.title: Show previous position of PDF upon load
showPreviousViewOnLoad.description: Whether to view PDF documents in the last page and position upon opening the viewer.

defaultZoomValue.title: Default zoom level
defaultZoomValue.description: Default zoom level of the viewer. Accepted values: 'auto', 'page-actual', 'page-width', 'page-height', 'page-fit', or a zoom level in percents.

sidebarViewOnLoad.title: Sidebar state on load
sidebarViewOnLoad.description:
Controls the state of the sidebar upon load.
 0 = do not show sidebar.
 1 = show thumbnails in sidebar.
 2 = show document outline in sidebar.
 3 = Show attachments in sidebar.

enableHandToolOnLoad.description: DEPRECATED. Set cursorToolOnLoad to 1 to enable the hand tool by default.

cursorToolOnLoad.title: Cursor tool on load
cursorToolOnLoad.description:
The cursor tool that is enabled upon load.
 0 = Text selection tool.
 1 = Hand tool.

disableRange.title: Disable range requests
disableRange.description: Whether to disable range requests (not recommended).

disableStream.title: Disable streaming for requests
disableStream.description: Whether to disable streaming for requests (not recommended).

disableFontFace.title: Disable @font-face
disableFontFace.description: Whether to disable @font-face and fall back to canvas rendering (this is more resource-intensive).

disableTextLayer.description: DEPRECATED. Set textLayerMode to 0 to disable the text selection layer by default.

enhanceTextSelection.description: DEPRECATED. Set textLayerMode to 2 to use the enhanced text selection layer by default.

textLayerMode.title: Text layer mode
textLayerMode.description:
Controls if the text layer is enabled, and the selection mode that is used.
 0 = Disabled.
 1 = Enabled.
 2 = (Experimental) Enabled, with enhanced text selection.

externalLinkTarget.title: External links target window
externalLinkTarget.description:
Controls how external links will be opened.
 0 = default.
 1 = replaces current window.
 2 = new window/tab.
 3 = parent.
 4 = in top window.

disableTelemetry.title: Disable telemetry
disableTelemetry.description: Whether to prevent the extension from reporting the extension and browser version to the extension developers.

enablePrintAutoRotate.title: Automatically rotate printed pages
enablePrintAutoRotate.description: When enabled, pages whose orientation differ from the first page are rotated when printed.

scrollModeOnLoad.title: Scroll mode on load
scrollModeOnLoad.description:
Controls how the viewer scrolls upon load.
 0 = Vertical scrolling.
 1 = Horizontal scrolling.
 2 = Wrapped scrolling.

spreadModeOnLoad.title: Spread mode on load
spreadModeOnLoad.description:
Whether the viewer should join pages into spreads upon load.
 0 = No spreads.
 1 = Odd spreads.
 2 = Even spreads.
